# uptimekuma_notification_pagertree (Resource)

PagerTree notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_pagertree" "example" {
  name            = "PagerTree Notification"
  is_active       = true
  integration_url = "https://alerts.pagertree.com/api/v2/incidents"
  urgency         = "high"
  auto_resolve    = "resolve"
  apply_existing  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `integration_url` (String, Sensitive) PagerTree integration endpoint URL
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `auto_resolve` (String) Auto-resolve alerts (use 'resolve' to enable)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `urgency` (String) Urgency level of the alert (e.g., high, medium, low)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
